cards.name: The Tide
cards.text:
High Tide
(The tide is high for you.)
Low Tide
(The tide is low for you.)
Omni: Raise the tide. Gain 3 chains.

cards.name: Armadrone
cards.text: Fight: Steal 2.

cards.name: Binary Moray
cards.text:
Skirmish.
 After you raise the tide, ready Binary Moray.
 After your opponent raises the tide, exhaust Binary Moray.

cards.name: Captain Kresage
cards.text: Each creature loses elusive, taunt, poison, and skirmish.

cards.name: Old Egad
cards.text: Destroyed: Enrage each enemy creature.

cards.name: PI Sweven
cards.text:  Reap: If the tide is high, your opponent discards a random card from their hand.

cards.name: Prof. Garwynne
cards.text:
Skirmish.
Fight: You may choose a card in your archives and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Talmage Steelheart
cards.text: Play: Deal damage to an enemy creature equal to the number of cards you have played this turn (including this one).

cards.name: Dr. Verokter
cards.text:
Elusive.
Reap: Put an upgrade or action card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

cards.name: Rooftop Laboratory
cards.text: Each friendly Scientist creature enters play ready.

cards.name: Reckless Experimentation
cards.text: This creature gains, "Reap: Play the top card of your deck."

cards.name: Groundbreaking Discovery
cards.text: Play: If you control Dr. Verokter, Rooftop Laboratory, and Reckless Experimentation, destroy each card in play, unforge an opponent’s key, and purge Groundbreaking Discovery.

cards.name: Hyde
cards.text:
Reap: Draw a card. If you control Velum, draw 2 cards instead.
Destroyed: Archive Velum from your discard pile. If you do, archive Hyde.

cards.name: Velum
cards.text:
Reap: Archive a card. If you control Hyde, archive 2 cards instead.
Destroyed: Archive Hyde from your discard pile. If you do, archive Velum.

cards.name: Academy Training
cards.text:
If you control this creature, it belongs to house Logos. (Instead of its original house.)
This creature gains, “Reap: Draw a card.”

cards.name: Backup Plan
cards.text: Play: For each creature your opponent controls in excess of you, archive the top card of your deck.

cards.name: Captain Kresage
cards.text: While you control another creature with elusive, taunt, poison, or skirmish, Captain Kresage gains that keyword.

cards.name: Chronophage
cards.text: Your opponent's creatures and artifacts gain omega. (After they play that card, end the current step.)

cards.name: Honors Keysis
cards.text: Play: Forge a key at +7 current cost, reduced by 1 for each card you have played this turn (including this one). If you do, purge Honors Keysis.

cards.name: Knowledge is Power
cards.text:
Play: Choose one:
• Archive a card.
• Gain 1 for each card in your archives.

cards.name: Library Card
cards.text: Action: Purge Library Card. If you do, for the remainder of the turn, after you play a card, draw a card.

cards.name: Master the Theory
cards.text: Play: If there are no friendly creatures, you may archive a card for each enemy creature.

cards.name: Mind Over Matter
cards.text: Play: Put each creature into its owner's archives.

cards.name: Mobius Scroll
cards.text: Action: Archive Mobius Scroll and up to 2 cards from your hand.

cards.name: Ruins of Archonis
cards.text:
Play: Put  4 on Ruins of Archonis from the common supply. Archive a card.
After a player plays their 6th card in a turn, if Ruins of Archonis is ready, move each  from Ruins of Archonis to that player's pool.

cards.name: SLRS Austeralis
cards.text: Action: Exhaust up to 3 friendly Logos creatures. For each creature exhausted this way, play the top card of your deck, one at a time.

cards.name: The Archivist
cards.text:
If you archive The Archivist, archive it faceup.
While The Archivist is in your archives, instead of picking up all of your archives, you may choose to pick up any number of cards in your archives.

cards.name: The Howling Pit
cards.text: Each player refills their hand to 1 additional card during their “draw cards” step.

cards.name: Tide Warp
cards.text:  At the start of your turn, if the tide is high, your opponent raises the tide. Otherwise, you raise the tide.

cards.name: Universal Keylock
cards.text:
Keys cost +3.
After a player forges a key, destroy Universal Keylock.

cards.name: Vespilon Theorist
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
Reap: Choose a house. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is of that house, archive it and gain 1. Otherwise, discard it.

cards.name: Zenzizenzizenzic
cards.text: While Zenzizenzizenzic is in the center of your battleline, refill your hand to 2 additional cards during your "draw cards" step.

cards.name: Anomaly Exploiter
cards.text: Action: Destroy a damaged creature.

cards.name: Archon's Callback
cards.text:
Omega. (After you play this card, end this step.)
Play: Draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Binary Moray
cards.text:
 After you raise the tide, ready Binary Moray.
 After your opponent raises the tide, exhaust Binary Moray.
Reap: Archive a card.

cards.name: Bouncing Deathquark
cards.text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature and a friendly creature. You may repeat this effect as many times as you like, as long as it is possible to repeat the entire effect.

cards.name: Brain Eater
cards.text: After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Brain Eater, draw a card.

cards.name: Data Forge
cards.text: Play: You may forge a key at +10 current cost, reduced by 1 for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Eureka!
cards.text:
Alpha.
Play: Gain 2. Archive 2 random cards.

cards.name: Fila the Researcher
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
After a creature is played adjacent to Fila the Researcher, draw a card.

cards.name: Forgive or Forget
cards.text:
Play: Choose one:
• Archive 2 cards of different types from your discard pile.
• Purge up to 2 cards from each discard pile.

cards.name: Isotropic Core
cards.text: Each friendly creature gains hazardous 1.  (Before that creature is attacked, deal 1 to the attacking enemy.)

cards.name: Mechabuoy
cards.text:  At the start of each player’s turn, if the tide is high for that player, they gain 1.

cards.name: Mind Bullets
cards.text: Play: Deal 1 to each creature for each card you have played this turn (including this one).

cards.name: Novu Archaeologist
cards.text: Action: Archive a card from your discard pile.

cards.name: Positron Bolt
cards.text: Play: Deal 3 to a flank creature. Deal 2 to its neighbor. Deal 1 to the second creature’s other neighbor.

cards.name: Prof. Garwynne
cards.text:
Elusive.
Reap: You may choose a card in your archives and put it into your hand.

cards.name: Think Twice
cards.text: Play: Play an action card from your discard pile, then purge it.

cards.name: Armadrone
cards.text: Fight: Steal 1.

cards.name: Austeralis Seaborg
cards.text:  Reap: Deal 2 to a creature. If this damage destroys that creature, raise the tide.

cards.name: Bilgewarden
cards.text:  Play/Reap: If the tide is high, your opponent raises the tide. Otherwise, you raise the tide.

cards.name: EDAI “Edie” 4x4
cards.text:
Play: Archive a card.
Your opponent’s keys cost +1 for each card in your archives.

cards.name: Final Analysis
cards.text: Play: Destroy each creature. Each player draws a card for each creature they controlled that was destroyed this way.

cards.name: Hydrocataloguer
cards.text:  After a player raises the tide, they archive the top card of their deck.

cards.name: Infomorph
cards.text: Enhance . (These icons have already been added to cards in your deck.)

cards.name: Information Exchange
cards.text: Play: Steal 1. If your opponent stole  from you on their previous turn, steal 2 instead.

cards.name: Old Egad
cards.text: Destroyed: Ward each of Old Egad's neighbors.

cards.name: Phase Shift
cards.text: Play: You may play a non-Logos card this turn.

cards.name: PI Sweven
cards.text:  Reap: If the tide is high, draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Science!
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, after you play another action card, gain 1 .

cards.name: Static Charge
cards.text: This creature gains, "At the start of your turn, deal 2 to each of this creature's neighbors."

cards.name: Submersive Principle
cards.text:  Play: Each player loses 1. If the tide is high, each player loses half their  instead (rounding down the loss).

cards.name: Talmage Steelheart
cards.text: Play: Give Talmage Steelheart a +1 power counter for each card you have played this turn (including this one).

cards.name: Theory or Conjecture
cards.text:
Play: Choose one:
• Archive the top 2 cards of your deck.
• Play the top card of your deck.

cards.name: Almsmaster
cards.text:
Deploy.
Each of Almsmaster's neighbors gains, "Destroyed: Steal 1."

cards.name: Grey Augur
cards.text: Each of Grey Augur's neighbors gains, "Reap: Gain 1 and exalt this creature."

cards.name: Lærie of the Lake
cards.text:  While the tide is high, Lærie of the Lake gets +5 armor.

cards.name: Lightsmith Clariel
cards.text: Action: Switch a creature's power and armor for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: Seneschal Sargassa
cards.text:  After a player raises the tide, Seneschal Sargassa captures 2 from your opponent.

cards.name: Sir Bevor
cards.text: Poison. (Any damage dealt by this creature’s power during a fight destroys the damaged creature.)

cards.name: Urien the Circumspect
cards.text: Reap: Your opponent loses  equal to Urien the Circumspect's armor.

cards.name: Orphiel, Sea's Chosen
cards.text:  While the tide is high, Orphiel, Sea’s Chosen gains skirmish and, “Fight: Gain 2.”

cards.name: Orphion, Land's Chosen
cards.text:  While the tide is low, Orphion, Land’s Chosen gets +3 armor and gains, “Reap: Capture 2.”

cards.name: Aja the Inconspicuous
cards.text: While Aja the Inconspicuous is not on a flank, it cannot be dealt damage.

cards.name: Avenging Aura
cards.text: For the remainder of the turn, each friendly creature gains assault X, where X is the number of forged keys your opponent has.

cards.name: Charge!
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, each creature you play gains, “Play: Deal 2 to an enemy creature.”

cards.name: Dry the River
cards.text:  Each creature gains, “While the tide is low, this creature cannot reap.”

cards.name: Epic Quest
cards.text:
Play: Archive each friendly Knight creature from play.
Omni: If you have played 7 or more Sanctum cards this turn, destroy Epic Quest and forge a key at no cost.

cards.name: Harmonic Ritual
cards.text: Play: Choose a friendly creature. If its left neighbor shares a house with it, gain 1 and repeat this effect on that creature.

cards.name: Lady Loreena
cards.text:
Taunt.
Lady Loreena’s taunt also applies to its neighbors’ neighbors.

cards.text: Before Fight: You may switch Lightsmith Clariel's power and armor for the remainder of the turn.

cards.name: Lord Golgotha

cards.name: Mad Prophet Gizelhart
cards.text: While Mad Prophet Gizelhart is in the center of your battleline, it gains, "Action: Fully heal each non-Mutant creature. Gain 1 for each creature healed this way."

cards.name: Mighty Lance
cards.text: Play: Deal 3 to a creature and 3 to a neighbor of that creature.

cards.name: Numquid the Fair
cards.text: Play: Destroy an enemy creature. Repeat this effect if your opponent still controls more creatures than you.

cards.name: Orb of Wonder
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Orb of Wonder. If you do, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Round Table
cards.text: Each friendly Knight creature gets +1 power and gains taunt.

cards.text:
Taunt. (This creature’s neighbors cannot be attacked unless they have taunt.)

cards.name: Seraphic Armor
cards.text:
This creature gets +1 armor.

cards.name: SGS Illuminator
cards.text: Action: Exhaust up to 4 friendly Sanctum creatures. For each creature exhausted this way, stun and exalt a creature.

cards.name: The Corpulent Collector
cards.text: Play: Capture all of your opponent's . Deal 1 to The Corpulent Collector for each  on it.

cards.name: The Vaultkeeper
cards.text: Your  cannot be stolen.

cards.name: Trial by Water
cards.text:  Play: Reset the tide. Until the start of your next turn, players cannot raise the tide.

cards.text:
Deploy. Taunt.

cards.name: Barrister Joya

cards.text: Play: Each player with 6 or more loses all but 5 of it.

cards.text:
Play: Choose one:
• Purge each creature with the highest power.

cards.name: Grey Augur

cards.name: Radiant Truth
cards.text: Play: Stun each enemy creature not on a flank.

cards.name: Redhand Registry
cards.text: After  is stolen from you, your opponent skips the "forge a key" step during their next turn.

cards.name: Shoulder Armor

cards.name: Badgemagus
cards.text:
Deploy. (This creature can enter play anywhere in your battleline.)

cards.name: Bull-wark
cards.text:
Assault 2. (Before this creature attacks, deal 2 to the attacked enemy.)

cards.name: General Xalvador

cards.name: Æmberfin Shark
cards.text: At the end of your turn, each player loses 1. Give Æmberfin Shark a +1 power counter for each  lost this way.

cards.name: Chelonia
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
 After you play another creature, if the tide is high, your opponent loses 1.

cards.name: Mookling
cards.text: After your opponent forges a key, give Mookling a +1 power counter for each  spent to forge that key.

cards.name: Ol' Paddy
cards.text:  Reap: Discard the bottom card of your opponent's deck, or the bottom 3 cards instead if the tide is high. Destroy a creature that shares a house with 1 of the discarded cards.

cards.name: Sporegorger
cards.text:
Play: Move each +1 power counter in play to Sporegorger.
Reap: You may remove each +1 power counter from Sporegorger. For each counter removed this way, deal 1 to each other creature.

cards.name: Witch of the Dawn
cards.text: Play: Destroy another friendly creature. If you do, play a different creature from your discard pile. Ready and use that creature.

cards.name: Youngest Bear
cards.text: Reap: You may fight with 1 of Youngest Bear's neighbors.

cards.name: Chenille
cards.text:
Hazardous 6.
Action: Return a Bombyx from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Bombyx
cards.text:
Play: Destroy a friendly Chenille. If you do not, destroy Bombyx.
Action: Return a Fifalde from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Fifalde
cards.text:
Play: Destroy a friendly Bombyx. If you do not, destroy Fifalde.
Fight/Reap: Fully heal Fifalde and gain 1.

cards.name: Æmberfin Shark
cards.text:
Play: Give Æmberfin Shark three +1 power counters.
At the end of your turn, remove a +1 power counter from Æmberfin Shark. If you do, each player gains 1.

cards.name: Blossom Drake
cards.text:
Blossom Drake gets +1 power for each artifact in play.
Each artifact’s text box is considered blank (except for traits).

cards.name: Chonkers
cards.text:
Skirmish.
After an enemy creature is destroyed fighting Chonkers, double the number of +1 power counters on Chonkers.
Play: Give Chonkers a +1 power counter.

cards.name: Creed of Nature
cards.text: Omni: Destroy Creed of Nature. If you do, choose a creature. For the remainder of the turn, that creature gains skirmish and assault X. X is its power.

cards.name: Dredging Druid
cards.text:
Elusive.
 Reap: If the tide is high, put up to 3 creatures from your discard pile on top of your deck.

cards.name: Eldest Bear
cards.text:
Assault 3.
While Eldest Bear is in the center of your battleline, it gains, "Before Fight: Gain 2."

cards.name: Fertility Chant
cards.text: Play: Your opponent gains 2.

cards.name: Fuzzy Gruen
cards.text: Play: Your opponent gains 1.

cards.name: Lupo the Scarred
cards.text:
Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
Play: Deal 2 to an enemy creature.

cards.name: Pestergrove
cards.text: Each creature enters play enraged.

cards.name: Piranha Monkeys
cards.text: Play/Reap: Deal 2 to each other creature.

cards.name: Primal Relic
cards.text:
Play: Put  4 on Primal Relic from the common supply. Give 3 creatures a +1 power counter.
At the start of each player’s turn, if they control creatures with total power 20 or higher, move each  from Primal Relic to that player's pool.

cards.name: Punctuated Equilibrium
cards.text: Play: Each player discards their hand, then refills their hand as if it were their “draw cards” step.

cards.name: Ritual of Life
cards.text: Action: Destroy a friendly creature. If you do, return a different creature from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Stampede
cards.text: Play: If you used 3 or more creatures this turn, steal 2.

cards.name: The Mysticeti
cards.text: Action: Exhaust 1 or more friendly Untamed creatures. If you do, give The Mysticeti three +1 power counters for each creature exhausted this way and move it anywhere in your battleline as a creature with 0 power and taunt.

cards.name: Washed Away
cards.text:  Play: If the tide is high, destroy each artifact. Otherwise, raise the tide.

cards.name: Word of Returning
cards.text: Play: Deal 1 to each enemy creature for each  on it. Move each  from those creatures to your pool.

cards.name: World Tree
cards.text: Action: Return a creature from your discard pile to the top of your deck.

cards.name: Æmbermancy
cards.text: Play: Remove up to three +1 power counters from a creature. Gain 1 for each counter removed this way.

cards.name: Beach Day
cards.text:  Play: Return a creature to its owner's hand. If the tide is high, gain 1.

cards.name: Bumblebird
cards.text:
Alpha. (You can only play this card before doing anything else this step.)
Play: Give two +1 power counters to each other friendly Untamed creature.

cards.name: Cross Porpoises
cards.text:  Play: Raise the tide. Enrage 2 enemy creatures.

cards.name: Fangtooth Cavern
cards.text: At the end of your turn, destroy the least powerful creature.

cards.name: Gebuk
cards.text: Destroyed: Discard the top card of your deck. If it is a creature, after Gebuk leaves play, put that creature into play in Gebuk’s position in the battleline.

cards.name: Genetic Drift
cards.text: Play: Give a creature a +1 power counter. Then give each creature with a +1 power counter another +1 power counter.

cards.name: Growth Surge
cards.text: Play: Give a flank creature three +1 power counters. Give its neighbor two +1 power counters. Give the second creature's other neighbor a +1 power counter.

cards.name: Instrument of Silence
cards.text: This creature gains skirmish and, “Fight: Gain 1.”

cards.name: Kangaphant
cards.text: Each creature gains, “Reap: Destroy this creature.”

cards.name: Mushroom Man
cards.text: Mushroom Man gets +3 power for each unforged key you have.

cards.name: Ol' Paddy
cards.text:  Reap: Discard the bottom card of your deck, or the bottom 3 cards instead if the tide is high. Play each creature discarded this way, one at a time.

cards.name: Ritual of Balance
cards.text: Action: If your opponent has 6 or more, steal 1.

cards.name: Sporegorger
cards.text: Reap: Give Sporegorger a +1 power counter. You may remove each +1 power counter from Sporegorger. For each counter removed this way, deal 1 to each other creature.

cards.name: Thin the Herd
cards.text: Play: Shuffle the 4 least powerful creatures into their owners’ decks.

cards.name: Waste Not
cards.text: Play: Destroy a friendly creature. Draw cards equal to half that creature's power (rounding up).

cards.name: All Tide Up
cards.text:  Play: If the tide is high, gain 1. Otherwise, raise the tide.

cards.name: Assert Dominance
cards.text: Play: For the remainder of the turn, a friendly creature gains skirmish. Ready and fight with that creature.

cards.name: Chelonia
cards.text:
Elusive. (The first time this creature is attacked each turn, no damage is dealt.)
 After you play another creature, if the tide is high, gain 1.

cards.name: Deepwater Gruen
cards.text:  Play/Reap: If the tide is low, your opponent gains 1.

cards.name: Floomf
cards.text:
Skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
Fight: Give a Beast creature two +1 power counters.

cards.name: Infighting
cards.text: Play: Each creature deals damage equal to its power to its right neighbor.

cards.name: Keyfrog
cards.text: Destroyed: Forge a key at current cost.

cards.name: Mollymawk
cards.text: Play: Destroy an artifact.

cards.name: Mookling
cards.text: Your opponent's keys cost +X, where X is Mookling's power.

cards.name: Myliobe
cards.text:
 While the tide is high, Myliobe gains skirmish. (When you use this creature to fight, it is dealt no damage in return.)
Before Fight: Enrage the creature Myliobe fights and each of that creature’s neighbors.

cards.name: Persistence Hunting
cards.text: Play: Choose a house. Exhaust each enemy creature of the chosen house.

cards.name: Reap or Sow
cards.text:
Play: Choose one:
• Ready and reap with a friendly creature.
• Give three +1 power counters to creatures, distributed as you choose.

cards.name: The Fittest
cards.text: Play: Give each friendly creature a +1 power counter.

cards.name: Way of the Pixie
cards.text: This creature gains, "Reap: Gain 1."

cards.name: Witch of the Dawn
cards.text: Play: Return a creature from your discard pile to your hand.

cards.name: Youngest Bear
cards.text: Reap: You may reap with 1 of Youngest Bear's neighbors.
